articles.title: Leveraging industry leading platforms, let us show you how we help some of Australia's largest organisations with their low-code strategy.

articles.html:
Low-code application platforms (LCAP) provide guided application development, automation and governance capabilities, enabling professional and citizen developers to rapidly develop digital solutions.

LCAPs can be used as rapid application development platforms, which enable businesses to quickly create applications by abstracting and minimising traditional low-level coding. As a result, LCAPs can accelerate the development processes and reduce time to market. In addition, low-code platforms can provide governance and control over the development process, and the ability to automatically generate code that is compliant with corporate standards. This can help to reduce the risk of errors and improve the quality of the application.

The adoption of LCAPs is accelerating across all industries as organisations demand new digital solutions in rapidly changing operational environments, where skilled developers are often in short supply. With a well-designed & executed strategy, low-code/no-code can enable rapid scale by removing financial and resource barries which would have made many initiatives previously unviable.

articles.title: Design principles to consider with your next low-code strategy.
articles.html:
1. No software development experience required by citizen developers.
2. One time installation, configuration and setup of low-code/no-code platform.
3. Design & develop reusable business components, case types, integrations and reports that are ready to use “off-the-shelf” & fully tailorable to all business needs.
4. Keep businesses in the low-code lane as much as possible.
5. Avoid customisation/divergence away from product guardrails.
Upgrade Ready = Always up-to-date with latest product features.
6. Data-Driven design. Control solution parameters, behaviour & layout through data instead of code/classes.
